metadata.title: Ryu - AI Trading Agents & Position Marketplace
metadata.description: Build AI trading agents on Hyperliquid. Create strategies by prompt, trade AI-reasoned leveraged positions, and earn from your trading logic. Positions don't dieâ€”they become tradable opportunities.

shaderHero.description: Harness the power of advanced AI algorithms to automate your trading strategies. Real-time market analysis, predictive models, and intelligent execution that adapts to market conditions.

howItWorksSection.title: AI Trading Made
howItWorksSection.subtitle: Start your automated trading journey in just three easy steps

step1.title: Prompt Your Strategy
step1.description: Simply describe your trading strategy in natural language. Our AI understands your goals and creates a customized trading plan.

step2.title: Select Your Assets
step2.description: Choose from a wide range of cryptocurrencies, stocks, forex, or commodities. Trade what you know best.

step3.title: Start Trading
step3.description: Deposit funds and let AI take over. Watch your strategy execute automatically with real-time monitoring.

marketplaceSection.title: AI Strategy

marketplacePage.title: AI Strategy Marketplace
marketplacePage.agentsDescription: Discover and purchase premium AI Trading Agentsâ€”intelligent bots that autonomously execute trading strategies 24/7. Powered by advanced algorithms and machine learning, these agents analyze markets in real-time, manage risk, and execute trades automatically, bringing institutional-grade trading to everyone.
marketplacePage.positionsDescription: Discover and purchase premium AI Trading Positionsâ€”pre-analyzed trade setups created by expert AI algorithms. Each position includes precise entry prices, target prices, and risk management levels, giving you professional-grade trading signals with transparent rationale and performance tracking.

agentPage.pageDescription: An AI Trading Agent is an intelligent bot that autonomously executes trading strategies 24/7. Powered by advanced algorithms and machine learning, these agents analyze markets in real-time, manage risk, and execute trades automatically, bringing institutional-grade trading to everyone.

pilot.title: Create Your Custom Agent
pilot.description: Answer a few questions and let AI design the perfect automation agent for your needs.

steps.agentDetailsDesc: Describe your agent and what it should automate
steps.connectionsDesc: Select which external services your agent will connect to (optional)
steps.reviewDesc: Review your agent configuration and let AI generate everything

placeholders.agentDescription:
Describe your trading strategy...

For example:
- Scan BTC, ETH, SOL perps on Hyperliquid for breakout patterns
- Enter 10-15x leveraged positions on volume-confirmed breaks
- Use trailing stops to lock profits as trade develops
- Exit at resistance or with 3% stop-loss
- Document full AI reasoning for each entry/exit
- List positions for continuation if stopped out early
- Track long-term performance and refine logic

hints.agentDescription: Be specific about what data you'll provide, what the agent should do, and what automation you want. The AI will imagine all features, forms, and schedules needed.

pilot.submitSuccess: Success! Your agent has been created and is ready to use. Setting up your workspace...
pilot.footerNote: AI will imagine all features, forms, and automation based on your description.

review.aiWillGenerate: ðŸ¤– AI will automatically generate all features, data models, forms, actions, and schedules based on your description and selected connections. This may take 10-30 seconds.

pilot.noConnectionsNote: No external services selected. AI will use generic webhooks for any API needs.
